Articles.Content:
can someone create a Bombardier Dash 8 Q400? 

 ![image003.jpg](http://www.x-plane.org/home/coanda2k4/Dash8Q400_files/image003.jpg)

thx-JWOC
It's in the Add-on Affairs, so I guess mod.
Preferably stock. But if you have B-9 it might look better
I didn't know where to put it cause there's no where to request crafts

Are you looking for player-made parts that will fill-in and let you make a Dash 8 Q400 or are you looking for a craft file with only stock parts?

I don't see how you could mean the first if you are looking for 'stock' and I don't see how you could want the second if you are looking for anything anywhere near or resembling enough.
Well ... building a stock twin turboprop isn't very hard. Just a lot of work and a lot of parts.
Well stock then......I'll see what I can do.
